plot: Documentary recounting French homicide detective Jean-Francois Abgrall's attempt to find justice for the victim of a 1989 murder in Brittany and his pursuit of a suspicious drifter, Francis Heaulme.
title: Dance with a Serial Killer
plot_es: Documentary recounting French homicide detective Jean-Francois Abgrall's attempt to find justice for the victim of a 1989 murder in Brittany and his pursuit of a suspicious drifter, Francis Heaulme.
plot_en: Documentary recounting French homicide detective Jean-Francois Abgrall's attempt to find justice for the victim of a 1989 murder in Brittany and his pursuit of a suspicious drifter, Francis Heaulme.
